# SetItemLoreFunction Class

## Extends
- [*LootItemFunction*](LootItemFunction.md)

Loot item function that modifies the lore of the item dropped.

## Properties

### **lore**
`read-only lore: string[];`

The lore to apply to the dropped item.

Type: *string*[]
